basics.name: [YOUR FIRST NAME] [YOUR LAST NAME]
basics.label: Tech Chief / Lead Software Engineer
basics.summary: Engineering leader with 11+ years of full-stack development experience, specializing in PHP/Laravel ecosystems. Currently serving as Tech Chief at a SaaS startup, leading product development and AI engineering initiatives. Proven track record spanning agency work delivering enterprise systems for 40+ clients, including ERP, HRM, accounting, and e-commerce platforms. Combines deep technical expertise with team leadership, having progressed from Senior Engineer to Lead Engineer to executive technical roles.

work.name: DxT
work.description: SaaS startup developing Translation Management System
work.summary: Leading technical strategy for SaaS Translation Management System (TMS) competing with industry leaders like Phrase.com. Dual role combining executive leadership with hands-on AI engineering.
highlights: Lead technical strategy for SaaS Translation Management System (TMS) competing with industry leaders
Direct cross-functional team of 5 members including 2 developers, 1 product manager, 1 QA engineer, and 1 project manager
Architect and implement AI-powered features for translation workflows, leveraging LLM integration
Define technology stack, coding standards, and CI/CD pipelines for scalable multi-tenant SaaS architecture
Own full product lifecycle from requirements to production monitoring, establishing engineering processes for startup growth phase

work.name: EQHO Communications
work.summary: Led development team at digital agency, delivering custom systems and websites for clients across diverse industries.
highlights: Led development team delivering custom systems and websites for multiple clients across diverse industries
Architected and delivered enterprise-grade solutions including ERP, CRM, and e-commerce platforms
Mentored junior developers through code reviews, pair programming, and technical workshops
Established modern development practices: Laravel + Livewire + Alpine.js stack
Implemented automated testing and CI/CD pipelines, improving deployment frequency
Conducted technical interviews and onboarding, scaling engineering team

work.name: EQHO Communications
work.position: Corporate Systems Manager / Senior Software Engineer
work.summary: Designed and developed suite of internal corporate systems and client-facing applications.
highlights: Designed and developed suite of internal corporate systems including Accounting, Project Management, HRM, and ERP modules
Built custom e-commerce platforms with high availability
Migrated legacy systems to Laravel framework, reducing maintenance overhead and improving performance
Integrated third-party APIs (payment gateways, shipping providers) streamlining operations
Managed MySQL/MongoDB databases with business-critical data, implementing backup and recovery procedures

work.name: Com7 AB
work.summary: Managed IT infrastructure and developed web applications for international telecom company.
highlights: Managed IT infrastructure across 3 international offices (Bangkok, Gothenburg, Stockholm)
Designed and developed company website with third-party integrations using PHP
Created custom database system using PHP, Python, and MySQL for resource management
Provided call support for corporate customers regarding phone switches, network, WiFi, and mobile devices
